fields.Title: CHURCH / STAINED GLASS WINDOW VISCAL
fields.Description: Viscal concerning the stained glass window. You can put important things together.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "The woman looks down at you kneelin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman looks down at you kneeling. She towers among her followers: architects, laymen, courtiers. There is a sad smile on her lips and a glint in her green-blue eye -- of what? Compassion? Remorse?
fields.Alternate1: The woman looks down at you kneeling. She towers among her followers: architects, laymen, courtiers. There is a sad smile on her lips and a glint in her green blue eye -- of what? Compassion? Remorse?
fields.Alternate2: The woman looks down at you standing there. She towers among her followers: architects, laymen, courtiers. There is a sad smile on her lips and a glint in her green-blue eye -- of what? Compassion? Remorse?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Cold air seeps in through the crack..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cold air seeps in through the crack in the glass, cooling the sweat on your forehead. Makes you shudder...

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Cold wind seeps in from the crack i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cold wind seeps in from the crack in the glass. Snowdrifts cover the floorboards at your feet. Above, you feel her multicoloured eyes on you. Inspecting you.

fields.Title: You: "It's compassion."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's compassion.

fields.Title: You: ""Who conducted this raid?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who conducted this raid?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good luck. You will not get inform..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good luck. You will not get information on a confidential operation from your station secretary just by calling. If you really don't remember -- it might be better to keep this one forgotten."

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "The woman looks by in silence, smil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman looks by in silence, smiling enigmatically.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If this man was really here when i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If this man was really here when it happened, then it's better for all of us that he doesn't remember what happened."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The past. It's a *silo* of sadness...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The past. It's a *silo* of sadness. Fermenting. You should keep away.

fields.Title: You: "To hell with this."
fields.Dialogue Text: To hell with this.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Mesque state tried to detach it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Mesque state tried to detach itself from innocentic rule. Parts of the world were experiencing whiplash from accelerating into secularism. Her mandatory education programs and mass resettlement of upstream Magritte were problematic as well. Dissenters were suppressed by a military force she called “The Army of Humanity"...

fields.Title: Andre: ""That's mega cool, man, you coming..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's mega cool, man, you coming up with theories in here like that. Right on."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That she is. A great sacral piece...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That she is. A great sacral piece. I wonder what we're doing here, however..." He takes his glasses off to clean them.

fields.Title: You: ""Okey-dokey.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okey-dokey."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Why?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why?

fields.Title: You: "No. I am not your bug."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. I am not your bug.

fields.Title: You: "It's not possible to live."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not possible to live.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "As that great and desperate thought..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that great and desperate thought passes through your mind, the lieutenant draws an x-shaped cross from shoulder to shoulder.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "On the coast of an uninhabited arch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the coast of an uninhabited archipelago, where only animals had roamed before. In the wild reeds.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "A jigsaw of broken shards falls int..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A jigsaw of broken shards falls into place in front of you: a ghostly reconstruction of the stained glass window. Before it was shattered there was an older woman beneath the younger one -- and a text, a *leitmotiv* below them both.

fields.Title: Logic: "Could these words be the password t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Could these words be the password that unlocks the filament memory?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Terribly. Women of the court were e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Terribly. Women of the court were expected to play both contract bridge and chess sufficiently well to prove an interesting challenge to a man -- a similar grasp in matters of philosophy, theology, and science was encouraged. She was, by all means, a kept woman...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She made the most of her position i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She made the most of her position in the Antedolorian court -- a court visited by the most prominent thinkers and artists of the day. In secret, she was becoming the era's pre-eminent philosopher of the state. A scalpel, a piercing gaze...

fields.Title: You: "Wow."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Yes. In a city called Advesperascit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. In a city called Advesperascit, in Vesper-Messina, her homeland. The name of the city means "Evening comes," but it happened on a winter's morning with the canals frozen and slush falling out of the sky.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Midwinter snow was beating the cobb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Midwinter snow was beating the cobblestones around her. A small attaché of officials stood by as her Therriers placed a white gold wreath on her head. The crowning was mostly witnessed by secret servicemen.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Suggesting those who fight against..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suggesting those who fight against it are not part of humanity.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you thinking of, if I may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you thinking of, if I may ask?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She introduced us to the idea of p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She introduced us to the idea of public education, retirement, and modern diplomacy." He takes his glasses off to clean them.

fields.Title: Andre: ""Cool, man! Yeah, we should light h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool, man! Yeah, we should light her up with disco lights. People are gonna lose their shit when they see a club for anodic music with this kind of... sacred shit."

fields.Title: Noid: ""Right on." A voice from the back o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right on." A voice from the back of the church. "She was inhuman. You've got a critical mind cop-man -- furthermore, Andre, we should board that window up. No one wants that spooky shit when they're dancing."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "The ocean feels distant. Its ebb an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The ocean feels distant. Its ebb and flow blocked off by the centuries-old pinewood sarcophagus around you.

fields.Title: You: "It's remorse."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's remorse.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "As that useless word passes through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that useless word passes through your mind, the lieutenant draws an x-shaped cross from shoulder to shoulder.

fields.Title: You: ""Tiago said the place was abandoned..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tiago said the place was abandoned because of a police raid. Do you know anything about it?"

fields.Title: You: "Reconstruct the cracked glass."
fields.Dialogue Text: Reconstruct the cracked glass.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "As that great and desperate thought..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that great and desperate thought passes through your mind you rise. From your knees and into the apricot-coloured light of the window. Above you, the woman keeps smiling her distant smile, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant, this used to say: 'Aft..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, this used to say: 'After life, death -- after'..."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The escutcheon on her throne says:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The escutcheon on her throne says: Irene the Navigator. She is depicted as an older woman wearing thick rimmed eye-glasses, holding a golden *reichsapfel* in one hand and a scepter in the other. This is the queen Her Innocence Dei advised -- above, she herself is whole.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ice cool," the lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ice cool," the lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is silence in the church. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is silence in the church. He wants there to be.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Although she is often considered to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Although she is often considered to be the greatest human being to ever live, there *was* something ominous about Dolores Dei -- constantly surrounded by her Therriers...

fields.Title: You: ""You're leaving something out.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're leaving something out."

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "That bitter thought passes through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That bitter thought passes through your mind as you stand in the apricot-coloured light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile above you, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "That terrible word rings through yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That terrible word rings through your mind as you stand in the apricot coloured-light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile above you, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: Empathy: "There it is again -- a small pang o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There it is again -- a small pang of guilt. It's time to ask him what happened here.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sorry, I'm not saying you were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry, I'm not saying you were..." There's a pause. "It was a clandestine operation. I don't know anything about it. Why it was conducted or who participated. I try not to pry into extra-district matters."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She was an almost preternaturally m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She was an almost preternaturally magnetic and intelligent individual. To her contemporaries she appeared out of time, a messenger from the future of the species. We *all* fell in love with her, head over heels. Even before she was declared an innocence her influence was tremendous.

fields.Title: You: "Okay. When did she rule?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay. When did she rule?

fields.Title: You: "Okay, what else? Was she smart?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, what else? Was she smart?

fields.Title: You: "I want more."
fields.Dialogue Text: I want more.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Wow indeed. When her innocence was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow indeed. When her innocence was declared -- and the queen she had advised for years fell on her knees before her -- she was so overcome with emotion that her *lungs* started *glowing* in her chest...

fields.Title: You: "Her crowning?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Her crowning?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Dolores Dei was shot in the chest w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dolores Dei was shot in the chest with a fowling piece, eight times. The man, thought to be insane, said he once touched her and her body had been unnaturally warm, like a furnace -- and that sometimes while on duty he observed her forgetting to breathe for over ten minutes...

fields.Title: You: "What happened?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What happened?

fields.Title: Andre: ""That's mega cool, man, you coming..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's mega cool, man, you coming in here and questioning religious symbolism like that. Right on."

fields.Title: Noid: ""We should board that window up, An..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should board that window up, Andre." A voice from the back of the church. "People don't want to see that woman when they're dancing. It's unhealthy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should be respectful here, alth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should be respectful here, although the building appears to be deserted. We have already found the instigator -- I'm not sure what else we could want from here..." He looks around.

fields.Title: You: ""You're not sure?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not sure?"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, are you a follower of Doloria..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, are you a follower of Dolorianism?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So do I.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So do I."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Exactly. Back out of this corner of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly. Back out of this corner of your mind by choosing the bottom-most option: "To hell with this."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "This subtle terror is part of her i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This subtle terror is part of her iconography.

fields.Title: You: ""Why did we tolerate this bourgeois..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why did we tolerate this bourgeois woman that long before we shot her?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""None of this is, in fact. This chu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "None of this is, in fact. This church. The coast... This isn't a good place to get lost in."

fields.Title: Andre: ""That's mega cool, man, you coming..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's mega cool, man, you coming in and accusing her of not being human like that. Right on, man!"

fields.Title: You: "Close your eyes first."
fields.Dialogue Text: Close your eyes first.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "That great and desperate thought pa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That great and desperate thought passes through your mind as you stand in the apricot-coloured light of the window. Above you, the woman keeps smiling her distant smile, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "As that terrible word passes throug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that terrible word passes through your mind, the lieutenant draws an x-shaped cross from shoulder to shoulder.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Your fingertips touch your chest fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your fingertips touch your chest four times. Then you rise from your knees, into the apricot-coloured light of the window. Above you, the woman still smiles her distant smile, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: ""This is Dolores Dei.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is Dolores Dei."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["church.stained_ency_this_is_dolores_dei"] == true  or  Variable["tc.dolores_dei_full_church"] == true)  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["church.stained_talked_to_kim_about_dolores"] == false

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Good call. She left us all in the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good call. She left us all in the shits, don't give her a single thing. Just stand there in the apricot-coloured light of the window, secretly grinding your teeth. The woman smiles her distant smile, unmoved, struck in half by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: ""I..." (Look around.) "I guess I co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I..." (Look around.) "I guess I could have been here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am pretty sure it was a clandest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am pretty sure it was a clandestine operation. I don't know anything more about it. Why it was conducted, or who participated... I try not to pry into extra-district matters."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "A motor carriage? A gunshot? Someon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A motor carriage? A gunshot? Someone falling into it? Or maybe just hooligans looking for something to break.

fields.Title: You: "Open your eyes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open your eyes.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "And then along the left side: APRÈS..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And then along the left side: APRÈS LE MONDE - LE GRIS; APRÈS LE GRIS - LE MONDE DE NOUVEAU.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "More. An innocence is elected to of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More. An innocence is elected to office by the Founding Party, a precedent that has taken place a mere six times in the entirety of History. The legal system of the Reál Belt is built to accommodate innocentic rule, should it coincide with our time.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Three hundred years ago, in the wak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Three hundred years ago, in the wake of the discovery of this isola -- the Insulindian -- by explorers from the continent of Mundi. She is, among other things, the innocence of interisolary travel and the connected world.

fields.Title: You: "She was crowned? Like Sola?"
fields.Dialogue Text: She was crowned? Like Sola?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way... this church, we shou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way... this church, we shouldn't linger here. This isn't a good place to get lost in."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay..." He takes his glasses off..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay..." He takes his glasses off to clean them. Then, after a while, he says:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In this church I mean? The coast i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In this church I mean? The coast in general... we shouldn't linger. This isn't a good place to get lost in."

fields.Title: Logic: "Something during the raid the lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something during the raid the lieutenant mentioned? Or just hooligans looking for something to break.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She acknowledges the passing of som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She acknowledges the passing of someone who is still alive...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "As if under a microscope."
fields.Dialogue Text: As if under a microscope.

fields.Title: You: "I'm not doing that cross either."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not doing that cross either.

fields.Title: You: ""You knew of the place?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You knew of the place?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Below both women, in luminous black..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Below both women, in luminous blackletter: APRÈS LA VIE - MORT; APRÈS LA MORT - LA VIE DE NOUVEAU.

fields.Title: You: "Where is this coming from?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where is this coming from?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "As did we all. The lands of Mesque..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As did we all. The lands of Mesque and the Occident and even far-away Supramundi -- altogether twenty one of the forty Mondial nations of the time -- immediately accepted innocentic rule. Even before her crowning.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Oh yes... She looked like humanity'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes... She looked like humanity's young mother, a perfect mother. Insultingly beautiful. It was as if her face and shoulders and hands were covered in a soft down of under-feathers. You know this well -- very well.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You already do. Although she is oft..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You already do. Although she is often considered to be the greatest human being to ever live, there *was* something ominous about Dolores Dei -- constantly surrounded by her Therriers...

fields.Title: Empathy: "An imperceptible tinge of fear. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An imperceptible tinge of fear. The lieutenant is afraid of the church. He does not know why, but he is.

fields.Title: Noid: ""Yeah, glowing lungs *are* fucked u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, glowing lungs *are* fucked up." A voice from the back of the church. "We should board that window up. Bad sines, you know?"

fields.Title: Andre: ""Uhm..." Andre doesn't know what to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm..." Andre doesn't know what to say. "It's cold man, you've been looking at that window for like forever now, man. You should dance, get some warmth!"

fields.Title: Drama: "Stonewalling. Good technique."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stonewalling. Good technique.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Bystanders reported golden filament..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bystanders reported golden filaments lighting the already sunlit chamber around her, clearly visible beneath her dress.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Cradled in her arms are a pair of g..."
fields.Dialogue Text:
Cradled in her arms are a pair of glowing lungs, clearly visible from underneath her flowing dress. 

You should kneel.

fields.Title: You: "It's mourning."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's mourning.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "As that bitter thought passes throu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that bitter thought passes through your head, the lieutenant draws an x-shaped cross from shoulder to shoulder. With three fingers.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Serves her right. She only cares ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Serves her right. She only cares about her sovereign's orb and her silk robes and getting to the aerodrome on time -- to *leave*.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't remember being here.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't remember being here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree. It happened a while ago...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree. It happened a while ago. It's unimportant to our business in Martinaise now."

fields.Title: You: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: You: "Wait, what exactly is an *innocence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, what exactly is an *innocence*?
fields.Alternate1: Wait, what exactly is an innocence? I've read a book but it was fuzzy...
fields.Alternate2: Wait, what exactly is an innocence? I've heard of the system...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She was dressed in a white and pear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She was dressed in a white and pearl dress on an emptied-out plaza, with the crowd far away. Already her *Therriers* -- the secret servicemen of the innocence -- were worried about an assassination attempt.

fields.Title: Andre: ""What are you thinking -- you okay?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you thinking -- you okay?" He seems a tad worried.

fields.Title: You: ""She's somehow connected to the cas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's somehow connected to the case."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "In the darkness, you sense her eyes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the darkness, you sense her eyes on you, inspecting you with their multicoloured glass. As if you're a bug under a microscope.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "That lonely word passes through you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That lonely word passes through your mind as you stand in the apricot-coloured light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile above you, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: "Better to not intrude upon him."
fields.Dialogue Text: Better to not intrude upon him.

fields.Title: You: ""If I was here, I should find out w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I was here, I should find out what I was doing." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: You: "Turn away. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Turn away. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She was the most socially secluded..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She was the most socially secluded and least self-aware of all the innocences. Some modern thinkers would consider her a war criminal for the campaigns she waged against the Mesque state. And then there were the resettlement programs...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, you've stood there for ov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, you've stood there for over five minutes..." The lieutenant's calm voice echoes in the cold air of the church.
fields.Alternate1: "Lieutenant-yefreitor, you've stood there for over five minutes..." The lieutenant's calm voice echoes in the cold air of the church.

fields.Title: You: "Like what? Is the task still on?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Like what? Is the task still on?

fields.Title: You: "Okay."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "As that soft word passes through yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that soft word passes through your mind, the lieutenant draws an x-shaped cross from shoulder to shoulder.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "That soft word passes through your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That soft word passes through your mind as you stand in the apricot-coloured light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: Empathy: "A pang of guilt? The lieutenant is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A pang of guilt? The lieutenant is leaving something out.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The old woman in the village was b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The old woman in the village was being tactful with us when she didn't mention it. She has more respect for the RCM than many around here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It happened a while ago. It's unim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It happened a while ago. It's unimportant to our business in Martinaise now."

fields.Title: You: ""I didn't think you were spiritual.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't think you were spiritual."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's Dolores Dei..." he says in a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Dolores Dei..." he says in a hushed voice. "The old woman was right. This is the Dolorian Church of Humanity in Martinaise. Or the Small Pinewood Church in some records."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's a mystery. A mystery sprinkled..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a mystery. A mystery sprinkled with self-pity and regret. For some reason, unknown to your mind, looking at her delicate eyes makes you feel like you're ready for drowning...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Nothing, just the edge of the crack..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing, just the edge of the crack sparkles in the dark. There may have been a writing here but you cannot make out what it said.

fields.Title: You: "What else do I know about her?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What else do I know about her?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "But... she was not hell. She is the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But... she was not hell. She is the opposite of that, the wind of paradise, stripping away the covers from the hearts of men...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Good. Now back out of this corner o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good. Now back out of this corner of your mind by choosing the bottom option: "To hell with this." You've been standing here long enough.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's been dead for three hundred..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's been dead for three hundred years. I am almost a thousand percent certain she isn't connected to the case..." He takes his glasses off to clean them.

fields.Title: Noid: ""That's not left wing, Andre. I don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not left wing, Andre. I don't think we should have that spooker adorning the club..." Another voice from the back of the church...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should be respectful here, alth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should be respectful here, although the building appears to be deserted. I do not believe we'll find anything connected to the lynching here. Something else, perhaps..." He looks at the machinery lying around.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Cold air seeps in through the crack..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cold air seeps in through the crack in the glass. The woman is keeping her colourful eye on both of you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Three Precincts were involved in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Three Precincts were involved in the raid and people say Precinct 41 was one of them."

fields.Title: You: "How did I know this is the *mother..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How did I know this is the *mother of humanism*?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Despite the damage you've done to y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Despite the damage you've done to yourself, the title appears lodged in your hippocampus. This is Her Innocence Dolores Dei -- the innocence of humanism, internationalism, and the welfare state -- perhaps the most famous human being ever to have lived.

fields.Title: You: "Do the same."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do the same.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "With that terrible word ringing thr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With that terrible word ringing through your mind, you rise -- into the apricot coloured-light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile above you, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "The mother of humanism towers above..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mother of humanism towers above you -- a wax painting on a cracked pane of glass. Nothing has changed in her expression.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Stained Glass Window: "The mother of humanism towers above..."]
You: "A tyrant?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A tyrant?

fields.Title: You: "Right. Better not to go poking any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Right. Better not to go poking any further.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Something that had walked in our mi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something that had walked in our midst, watching us stumble for hundreds, if not thousands of years, until it decided to interfere -- interfere in the course of our history. 'We were supposed to come up with this ourselves!' the man was reported to have screamed at the innocence...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "This *inhuman* quality was witnesse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This *inhuman* quality was witnessed by many others as well -- glowing lungs and all. It is commonly attributed to mass hysteria and religious psychology.

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. Just looking around.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Just looking around."

fields.Title: Noid: ""We should board that old spooker u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should board that old spooker up, Andre." A voice from the back of the church. "It'll only disturb the people while they're trying to dance, unshackled by the failure of humanism."

fields.Title: Drama: "A very, very skilled thespian would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A very, very skilled thespian would detect a touch of drama when he says he doesn't know why it was conducted...

fields.Title: You: "What shattered this mosaic?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What shattered this mosaic?

fields.Title: You: "Because she's a stained glass windo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because she's a stained glass window.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Stained Glass Window: "The mother of humanism towers above..."]
Stained Glass Window: "There she still stands. In white, s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There she still stands. In white, silver, and apricot, the young mother of humankind. A crack runs across her body. She is impossibly tall, oval-faced and sad -- a dark and radiant majesty.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The old woman in the village was r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The old woman in the village was right..." He looks around. "This must be the Dolorian Church of Humanity in Martinaise -- or the Small Pinewood Church in some records..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There used to be seven stave churc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There used to be seven stave churches on the coast. Les Sept Soeurs they call them -- The Seven Sisters. Only one remains. The rest were burnt in the Revolution, or used for building materials."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you know *why* it was abandoned?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know *why* it was abandoned?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Small figures of wise men, common m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Small figures of wise men, common men, worshippers walk up the stairs to stand at her feet. Secret servicemen -- Therriers -- stand in a row guarding her. It must have taken years to produce this work in all its dizzying detail.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""'Justice, Union, Prudence, and For..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Justice, Union, Prudence, and Force'."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "In a way. An innocence is elected t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In a way. An innocence is elected to office by the Founding Party, a precedent that has taken place a mere six times in the entirety of History. The legal system of the Reál Belt is built from the ground up to accommodate innocentic rule, should it coincide with our time.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Okay. When her innocence was declar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay. When her innocence was declared -- and the queen she had advised for years fell on her knees before her -- she was so overcome with emotion that her *lungs* started *glowing* in her chest...

fields.Title: You: "Then what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Then what?

fields.Title: You: ""Glowing lungs... That's fucked up...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glowing lungs... That's fucked up..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Your heart knows. But it does not w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your heart knows. But it does not want to say, not yet. Let these things be unknown for now.

fields.Title: Half Light: "No, she doesn't care about you. She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, she doesn't care about you. She only cares about her shiny sovereign's orb and her silk robes and getting to the aerodrome on time -- to *leave*!

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "This is Her Innocence Dolores Dei."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is Her Innocence Dolores Dei.

fields.Title: You: "Do the same as you get up."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do the same as you get up.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Your fingertips touch your chest fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your fingertips touch your chest four times. When it's done, you're still standing in the apricot-coloured light of the window. The woman smiles her distant smile, unmoved, struck in half by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: "The motto? What does it say?"
fields.Dialogue Text: The motto? What does it say?

fields.Title: You: ""Cool.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool."

fields.Title: You: ""I like the other one better.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I like the other one better."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Draped in ancient sadness. Are you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Draped in ancient sadness. Are you sure you want to remember this bit of historic trivia? Standing under her long slender form like this, dwarfed...

fields.Title: You: "Was there something... *terrifying*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Was there something... *terrifying* about her?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Little is known of her marchese hus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Little is known of her marchese husband. It's as if he vanished from history after completing his role -- which was to introduce Dolores Dei to court. In conclusion, yes, there *is* something lonely, paranoid, and even terrifying that people seldom mention, but *feel* when they think of her...

fields.Title: Empathy: "An imperceptible tinge of fear. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An imperceptible tinge of fear. The lieutenant is afraid of this place.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Glowing lungs are quite unusu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Glowing lungs are quite unusual. After that one time, they have not been reported to glow." He takes his glasses off to clean them.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. It's just that you've been l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. It's just that you've been looking at that window for quite long now. And it's cold in here..." He takes off his glasses to clean them.

fields.Title: Drama: "A touch of absurdity there, nice!"
fields.Dialogue Text: A touch of absurdity there, nice!

fields.Title: Empathy: "You."
fields.Dialogue Text: You.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "The world is silent, but for the cr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The world is silent, but for the creaks and cracks of the massive wooden structure behind you. It covers you from the wind outside.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not spiritual. It's constitut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not spiritual. It's constitutional. The Dolorian system does not demand faith -- only accordance."

fields.Title: You: ""Hmm..." (Stroke your chin first.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm..." (Stroke your chin first.)

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "As that soft word passes through yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that soft word passes through your mind, you rise -- into the apricot-coloured light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It was deemed *subservient* to use..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was deemed *subservient* to use a strongly Moralintern-related motto. We're already suspected of bootlicking. The sentence was also seen as... too feminine. It was a macho thing."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Many things. You know she was a wom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Many things. You know she was a woman of the court, the wife of an influential *marchese*, and eventually the principal advisor to Irene La Navigateur, Queen of Suresne (modern day Sur-la-Clef). Also, that she was gorgeous beyond beauty.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Yes -- big bummer. Boring history...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes -- big bummer. Boring history. Gotta keep it light, man, keep it moving. Get fucked up instead.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Fuck this pain, bratan. It's unheal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fuck this pain, bratan. It's unhealthy.

fields.Title: You: "She must have been beautiful..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She must have been beautiful...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She adored chess, yes -- but also m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She adored chess, yes -- but also military war games. Dolores Dei often holds a tiny tin soldier between her index finger and thumb -- in icons such as this. She was also blonde, the blondest woman you have ever seen, with green eyes the colour of the Pisantic *mare interregnum*...

fields.Title: Andre: ""Cool, man! Yeah! Look around as mu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool, man! Yeah! Look around as much as you wanna, this is *your* place too!"

fields.Title: You: "Looks like I can't give this figuri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like I can't give this figurine to her.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (CheckItem("figurine_set_headless_faln_rider")  or  CheckItem("figurine_set_revolutionary"))  and  Variable["TASK.offer_dolores_dei_figurines"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.offer_dolores_dei_figurines_done"] == false

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "She was crowned two years after the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She was crowned two years after the first expedition returned, setting in motion what is widely considered the greatest era in history -- the Dolorian Era.

fields.Title: You: "No."
fields.Dialogue Text: No.

fields.Title: You: ""Who is this, Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who is this, Kim?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["church.stained_ency_this_is_dolores_dei"] == false  and  Variable["tc.dolores_dei_full_church"] == false  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["church.stained_talked_to_kim_about_dolores"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He looks around. "I wasn't s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He looks around. "I wasn't sure before, but this must be the Dolorian Church of Humanity in Martinaise -- it's called the Small Pinewood Church in some records..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do." There's a pause, then he co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do." There's a pause, then he continues: "I heard it was a particularly bad one. The place was shot to pieces."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The shards glimmer in the dark -- y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The shards glimmer in the dark -- you see little pearls of light on the edges of the crack that splits the female figure. Something was written there... remains of broken letters line the emulsion. What it said, you do not know.

fields.Title: You: ""I like this. Puts the fear of god..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I like this. Puts the fear of god back in the f****ts."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The highest category of historic in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The highest category of historic individual -- an embodiment of the World Spirit.

fields.Title: You: "Is one in office now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Is one in office now?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "In a city called Advesperascit, in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In a city called Advesperascit, in Vesper-Messina, her homeland. The name of the city means 'Evening comes,' but it happened on a winter's morning with the canals frozen and slush falling out of the sky.

fields.Title: You: "How come?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How come?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "That is why the lungs are the symbo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That is why the lungs are the symbol of love for the cultures of the Reál Belt.

fields.Title: You: "I don't care how she looked. I don'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care how she looked. I don't care. It doesn't hurt me.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Oh, she was insultingly beautiful...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, she was insultingly beautiful. She was humanity's young mother, a perfect mother. It was as if her face and shoulders and hands were covered in a soft down of under-feathers. You know this well -- very well.

fields.Title: You: "What?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know... this church. The coast..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know... this church. The coast... we shouldn't linger. Finish what you came here to do and let's move on. This isn't a good place to get lost in."

fields.Title: Andre: ""That's mega cool, man, you coming..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's mega cool, man, you coming up with wild left-wing stuff in here like that. Right on!"

fields.Title: Noid: ""Right on." A voice from the back o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right on." A voice from the back of the church. "She was inhuman. You've got a critical mind, cop-man. Yo, Andre, we should board that window up. No one wants that spooky shit when they're dancing."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Unknown."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unknown.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Only a strange little sadness remai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Only a strange little sadness remains.

fields.Title: You: "No."
fields.Dialogue Text: No.

fields.Title: You: "Make the same gesture."
fields.Dialogue Text: Make the same gesture.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have a theory, yes." There's a p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have a theory, yes." There's a pause, then he continues: "There was a police raid a while back. I heard the place was shot to pieces."

fields.Title: You: ""Better to forget about it." (Proce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Better to forget about it." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well... your station was involved,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well... your station was involved, I hear. Although I can't be sure."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "How come the lieutenant isn't sure?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How come the lieutenant isn't sure? Is this confidential information?

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "No. You *must* know."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. You *must* know.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "In white, silver, and apricot faïen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In white, silver, and apricot faïence, the young mother of humanism stands above you. A crack runs across her body. She is impossibly tall, oval-faced and sad -- a dark and radiant majesty.

fields.Title: You: "Kneel."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kneel.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Your knees touch the floor. The flo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your knees touch the floor. The floorboards are hard and cold -- there you kneel among the snowdrifts, diffuse light falling on your hands from beyond the glass.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "Your fingertips touch your chest fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your fingertips touch your chest four times as you stand in the apricot-coloured light of the window. Above you, the woman still smiles her distant smile, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: "Step back."
fields.Dialogue Text: Step back.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This exaltation is common in Dolor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This exaltation is common in Dolorian sacralism. In the early years it was even incorporated as the RCM's slogan. No more, however."

fields.Title: You: "I don't care."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Terrifying. It's a simple word. She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Terrifying. It's a simple word. She was *bad* for humanity and you shouldn't have started thinking about her!

fields.Title: Andre: ""Hey man, you've stood there for li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey man, you've stood there for like... half an hour!" The hedgehog-haired man yells from across the coldness of the church.

fields.Title: You: ""She's not human.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's not human."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This church. The coast in general...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This church. The coast in general... we shouldn't linger here. This isn't a good place to get lost in."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should be respectful here, alth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should be respectful here, although the building appears to be deserted. I do not believe we'll find the instigator here. Something else, perhaps..." He looks at the machinery lying around.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "As that lonely word passes through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As that lonely word passes through your mind, you rise -- into the apricot-coloured light of the window. The woman keeps smiling her distant smile above you, sundered by the crack in the glass.

fields.Title: You: ""What is the RCM motto now?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is the RCM motto now?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "One of the men in this secret servi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of the men in this secret service killed her -- 22 years later. A young man who had come to suspect that Dolores Dei was not entirely human, but something else.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "*Terrifying* is a term too emotiona..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Terrifying* is a term too emotionally charged for your semantic memory. Or what remains of it, but...

fields.Title: You: "Yell: "War criminal!""
fields.Dialogue Text: Yell: "War criminal!"

fields.Title: You: "Look up."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look up.

fields.Title: You: "Look up."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look up.

fields.Title: You: ""What else do you know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What else do you know?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't like her. She looks like a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't like her. She looks like a *leaver*."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "No amount of *Commodore Red* can wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No amount of *Commodore Red* can wipe her sad smile from your brain-thing. It has survived the deluge and haunts you still. And will haunt you forever, as it haunts all men.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...death, life again," he nods. "A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...death, life again," he nods. "After the world, the pale; after the pale -- the world again."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You are brutal and *dumb*." He say..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are brutal and *dumb*." He says, his voice ice cold.

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "There you stand, below her once mor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There you stand, below her once more, with your hands on your side. Momentarily at a loss as to what to do with yourself.

fields.Title: You: "You're right. Time to heed the warn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're right. Time to heed the warning.

fields.Title: You: "No -- was there something *bad* abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No -- was there something *bad* about her, I want to know...

fields.Title: You: ""She's beautiful...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's beautiful..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way -- this church, the coa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way -- this church, the coast in general... we shouldn't linger here. This isn't a good place to get lost in. We should conclude our business and move on."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know about that..." He tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know about that..." He takes his glasses off to clean them. "It was a different time. A different war."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okey-doe-doe," he whispers in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okey-doe-doe," he whispers in the silence of the great building.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I assure you, I'm not." He looks u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assure you, I'm not." He looks up at the stained glass window.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "I don't know. What are we thinking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know. What are we thinking of? Part of your mind has gone on to other things already...

fields.Title: Stained Glass Window: "The mother of humanism stands above..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The mother of humanism stands above you -- a precious and complex wax painting on a single pane of glass. A crack runs across the length of her body, her face oval and sad.

fields.Title: You: "Leave me alone, woman. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Leave me alone, woman. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. We all are. Her name, body, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. We all are. Her name, body, and rule are synonymous with humanism. The laws we enforce are Dolorian in origin."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's Dolores Dei..." he says in a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Dolores Dei..." he says in a hushed voice. "I believe we are in the Dolorian Church of Humanity in Martinaise. Or the Small Pinewood Church in some records."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not at all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not at all."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "An innocence is infallible. The dec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An innocence is infallible. The decisions made by one are not decisions. They are inevitabilities -- what would have happened anyway, only accelerated, packed into decades instead of centuries. An Innocence is a continuous, compressed event, a sacred human being. It is an honour and a glory to live when one is in office.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "No. We are alone."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. We are alone.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "That does seem to be a problem... m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That does seem to be a problem... maybe you meant something else?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Bystanders reported golden filament..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bystanders reported golden filaments lighting the already sunlit chamber around her, clearly visible beneath her dress. I repeat: *Her lungs started glowing*. Do you care now?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a minor landmark, not easy to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a minor landmark, not easy to find. Most maps misplace it..." He lowers his voice. "It was built not long after Revachol's founding, 300 or so years ago by first-generation settlers."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Respectful? Is the lieutenant a fol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Respectful? Is the lieutenant a follower of Dolorianism?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea what you mean by th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no idea what you mean by that. We've been standing here long enough. We should look around, or get out."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "All you know is, this is the young..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All you know is, this is the young mother of humanity -- and that you should go. Do something else! Escape her sad, worryworn look.

fields.Title: You: "Who is this older woman?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who is this older woman?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "AFTER LIFE -- DEATH; AFTER DEATH --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: AFTER LIFE -- DEATH; AFTER DEATH -- LIFE AGAIN. AFTER THE WORLD -- THE PALE; AFTER THE PALE -- THE WORLD AGAIN. This is the great leitmotiv of humanism, a summary of the effect of the discovery of this isola -- the Insulindian -- on human thinking. A tremendous sea change akin to finding life after death...

fields.Title: You: ""Not very feminine.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not very feminine."

fields.Title: You: "A ruler?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A ruler?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It was on her advice that Irene La..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was on her advice that Irene La Navigateur sponsored a number of voyages into the pale. A costly, often tragic endeavour, ultimately vindicated by the discovery of the *New New World*, the piece of reality you're standing on...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This church. The coast in general...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This church. The coast in general... we shouldn't linger here. This isn't a good place to get lost in. We should conclude our business and move on."

fields.Title: Noid: ""I told you, Andre." A voice from t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I told you, Andre." A voice from the back of the church. "People don't want to see that woman when they're dancing. It's unhealthy. And we're *not* putting disco lights on it. That would only make it worse."

fields.Title: Acele: ""How about we *don't* do that, Noid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about we *don't* do that, Noid?" Another voice. "She looks cool."
